decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.

Condition : 2 - Notwithstanding the details shown on the drawings hereby approved, full specifications and fixing details of the external staircase and pedestrian gate to 61 Kew Bridge Station shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing prior to the commencement of development.  The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( Design and Access Statement (1213-01-sch02A), 1213-01-10, 1213-01-08C, 1213-01-06C, 1213-01-47C, 1213-01-45E, 1213-01-46C, Heritage Statement (April 2014) produced by Turley Heritage, Planning Statement produced by North Associates. ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
description: Change of use and alterations to the building to provide commercial uses on the lower ground and ground floors together with a 3-bedroom apartment on the top floor.  Creation of external stairs and side entrance at upper ground floor, changing of door to window in rear, installation of access gate to side, internal alterations to second floor.
